title: Beyond Good & Evil 2 is Still In Development, Says Ubisoft - Kinda Funny Games Daily LIVE 01.16.23
description:
Go to http://patreon.com/kindafunny to get SO MUCH extra exclusive Kinda Funny content!

Greg and Kahlief Adams from Spawn On Me talk Beyond Good and Evil 2, Silent Hill looking for more games, and the best selling games of 2022.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
Our Last of Us HBO episode 1 review is up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
Today, the Kinda Funny Football League returns! The playoffs are here and Game 1 will feature a Quarterback duel between Phil Spencer's Seahawks and Andrea Rene's Vikings. In game 2, your KF 49ers are taking on Gary Whitta, Parris Lilley and the Buccaneers. Tune in for all the first round action. The playoffs are here, baby. Get with the program u fucking loser.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Delaney Twining
The Roper Report   -
00:09:40 - Beyond Good & Evil 2 Still In Development, Claims Ubisoft - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer

00:29:25 - NPD has revealed the best-selling games of 2022 in the United States - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:38:00 - Ad
00:42:33 - Google Stadia Has Released One Final Game Ahead of Its Shutdown On January 18 - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:43:32 - Google Stadia is enabling Bluetooth on controllers!
00:50:13 - European Union is Reportedly Preparing to Challenge Microsoft's Activision Blizzard Deal - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:54:08 - Awesome Games Done Quick 2023 Raises Over $2.6 Million for the Prevent Cancer Foundation - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:56:20 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:57:35 - The Callisto Protocol has fallen well short of publisher Krafton’s sales expectations. Do you think we’ll ever see a sequel? - Kozibear
